markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Skeletal Giant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3196)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The reanimated bones of giants make excellent necromantic thralls.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Skeletal_Giant.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Skeletal Giant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3196)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=652" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=772" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 313 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20), [Half Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 50
([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) 5, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586) 5, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 5, piercing 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
glaive +12 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+7 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
horns +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d10+5 piercing

**Broad Swipe** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The giant makes two Strikes with its glaive against two adjacent foes, both of whom are within its reach. Both attacks count toward the giant's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.

**Terrifying Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The giant Strides and makes a horns Strike with a +4 circumstance bonus to damage. If the strike hits, the giant attempts to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) the target.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-472" />
name: Skeletal Giant

</summary>

text: Skeletal Giant The reanimated bones of giants make excellent necromantic thralls. Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 18 Unspecific Lore : DC 16 Specific Lore : DC 13 Skeletal Giant Source Monster Core pg. 313 1.1 Perception +7; darkvision Languages Skills Athletics +12, Intimidation +9 Str +5 Dex +1 Con +3 Int -5 Wis +0 Cha +2 Items Glaive, Half Plate --- AC 17 Fort +8 Ref +8 Will +7 HP 50 (void healing) Immunities bleed, death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious Resistances cold 5, electricity 5, fire 5, piercing 5, slashing 5 --- Speed 30 feet Melee Single Action glaive +12 (deadly d8, Forceful, reach 15 feet), Damage 1d8+7 slashing Melee Single Action horns +12 (Agile), Damage 1d10+5 piercing Broad Swipe Two Actions The giant makes two Strikes with its glaive against two adjacent foes, both of whom are within its reach. Both attacks count toward the giant's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks. Terrifying Charge Two Actions The giant Strides and makes a horns Strike with a +4 circumstance bonus to damage. If the strike hits, the giant attempts to Demoralize the target.
